official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for a lower rate of duty for certain offset printing presses of the sheet-fed type weighing 3,500 pounds or more.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to decrease the duty on certain offset printing presses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for a lower rate of duty for certain offset printing presses of the sheet-fed type weighing 3,500 pounds or more.
